headline: Dystopian AI report sinks DoorDash, software stocks
summary: Investing.com -- DoorDash shares fell 7% on Monday, while Uber dropped 3%, Salesforce declined 4%, MongoDB slid 6%, and ServiceNow lost 4%, following publication of a dystopian scenario analysis from Citirini Research examining potential risks from rapid AI advancement. Visa and Mastercard also declined, falling over 2%.

headline: Did Salesforce’s (CRM) AI Agent Push and Job Cuts Just Recast Its Automation-Driven Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent weeks, GoDaddy, REI Systems, and Asymbl have each announced new AI agent integrations and applications built on Salesforce platforms, while Salesforce itself cut nearly 1,000 jobs as it deepens its investment in artificial intelligence. Together, these moves highlight Salesforce’s push to make AI agents core to its ecosystem, enhancing governance, security, and workforce orchestration, even as that same automation begins to displace human roles. We’ll now examine how Salesforce’s...
